title: New: Wih'lo – It's True
body:
Despite still being in his teens, Chicago based producer **Wih’lo i**s beginning to make quite a name for himself, with his debut EP **_Wasted_** featuring on several of the internet’s hottest music blogs.

New track _It’s True_ is a bolder, more atmospheric number, fusing glitchy vocal samples with minimal, dubstep inspired beats, producing what may well be his best work yet. _It’s True_ is a sign of great things to come from this young artist.
